full_summary:
# Structural Engineering Request for Standing Offer [WS4451845681]

## Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified structural engineering firms to submit proposals for a Standing Offer to provide structural engineering services.

## Details

*   Contract Reference Number: WS4451845681
*   Document Reference Number: 4452303626
*   Solicitation Number: WS4451845681
*   Amendment Number: 5
*   Publication Date: 21 February 2024
*   Close Date: 16 April 2024, 14:00 Eastern Time
*   Amendment Date: 11 April 2024
*   Estimated Contract Start Date: 1 May 2024
*   Estimated Contract End Date: 30 April 2027

## Brief Description

The selected consultants will provide a wide range of services for structural engineering projects in the National Capital Region (NCR). PWGSC aims to authorize up to five (5) Standing Offers.

## Eligibility

Firms must demonstrate expertise in structural engineering services. Participation is open to firms that have the necessary knowledge and experience.

## Important Dates

*   Close Date: 16 April 2024, 14:00 Eastern Time

## Submissions

*   Proposal documents and supporting information must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery.
*   Late submissions will be rejected.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Evan Lecouvie, PSPC/SPAC, via email at [evan.lecouvie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:evan.lecouvie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Technical Specifications

*   Detailed technical specifications can be obtained through the Ariba Discovery portal [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18850984](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18850984).

## Standing Offers

*   The Standing Offers will be valid for a maximum period of three (3) years and may be extended for an additional two (2) periods of up to one (1) year each.
*   PWGSC reserves the right to decline to authorize any Standing Offer or to cancel the RFP process at any time without liability or obligation.
